text: Comox is a town in British Columbia on Vancouver Island. Comox is known for having the HMCS Quadra Sea Cadet training facility and Canadian air force base CFB Comox. The mayor of Comox is Nicole Minions. The population is 14,806 from the 2021 census. ==Other websites== Official city website Category:Cities in British Columbia Category:1953 establishments in North America Category:1950s establishments in Canada
title: Comox, British Columbia
